summary: This is a conversion for the Oblivion outfit Black Succubus Dress to the UNPC body. Converted by asenasen, originally made by yuravica.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]== About the Mod ==[/b][/size]

This is a conversion of yuravica's Oblivion mod "Black Succubus Dress" for the UNPC body.
The original mod made by yuravica can be found at this link: www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/44910/?
The outfit is female only[size=5][size=3],[/size][color=#000000] [color=#ffffff][size=2]and is not lore-friendly[/size][/color][/color][size=2].[/size]
[/size][b][size=5]
== Requirement(s) ==
[/size][/b]XMPSE 2.0 Skeleton.

Compatible UNP hands & feet meshes (There is no need to install the UNPC Body because it's already included in the outfit .nif files).

== Check List ==

Weight slider support: [b]Check
[/b]
Clipping-free guarantee: [b]Check
[/b]
[size=5][b]== Installation ==[/b][/size]


Just use any mod manager to install the armor.

Or manually, you can just drop everything into [Skyrim Directory]\Data

== Obtaining the Armor ==

Option 1: Use this wonderful mod AddItemMenu: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]http://www.nexusmods…im/mods/64905/?[/url]

Option 2: When ingame, press “~” to bring up console, type “help succubus” Add them into your game
using player.additem [Item ID] 1

[b][size=5]== Uninstalltation ==[/size][/b]

Deactivate in mod manager

Or delete the following:

Data\meshes\armor\FLY_armor
Data\textures\armor\FLY_armor
Succubus Dress.esp[b][size=5]

== To-do List ==
[/size][/b]- Nothing at this moment -

[b][size=5]== Credits ==
[/size][/b][b]yuravica[/b] for the original outfit.
[b]Halofarm[/b] for the UNPC body.

[size=5][b]== Permissions ==
[/b][/size]Since the original outfit is free to use without the permission,
this conversion is also free to use. You can convert to any body
type you want without noticing me, but please at least credit
yuravica for making it.
Thank you !

[b][size=5]== Tools Used ==
[/size][/b]3DS Max 2012 Student Version.

Nifskope.

GIMP 2.
author: Converted by asenasen - Originally made by yuravica
